item.description:
¿Le gustaría hablar mas español? ¡Yo tambien!  Unase a nosotros para una conversación informal.  Nos reunimos a hablar español los miércoles cada dos semanas.


We get together at Paneras Bread to speak Spanish every other Wednesday.  Please join us for some very informal conversation.


To help defray the cost of using Meetup.com, a voluntary $2 donation per meeting is appreciated.  (But FREE for native speakers ).


Nos vemos pronto,
Don
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us near the back of the restaurant.

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: SS Spanish Meetup @ Panera's in Braintree
